availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Dexter B. L. P. Robertson (Blandville Farmer)

body.p: Blandville, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Nancy P Robertson. Father of Allora E. Robertson, Luella C. Robertson, and Alfonzo D. Robertson. Farmer in Blandville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 15.
Find A Grave, "Dexter B. L. P. Robertson (December 28, 1828-1899)," Memorial #120226719, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/120226719 (accessed July 24, 2018).
